original_title: Fair weather expected in many areas today
original_body_lines: However, mainly fair weather will prevail in the other areas of the island.
Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces during the morning.
Mainly fair weather will prevail in the sea areas around the island.
Winds will be north-easterly and wind speed will be 30-35 kmph.
Wind speed may increase up to 45-55 kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending from Colombo to Kankesanturai via Puttalam and Mannar and from Pottuvil to Matara via Hambantota.
The sea areas off the coasts extending from Colombo to Kankesanturai via Puttalam and Mannar and from Pottuvil to Matara via Hambantota can be rough at times.
